argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | xmeter.1 | |- .~ = ( `' D " RR ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_xmeterval | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( P .~ x <-> ( P e. X /\ x e. X /\ ( P D x ) e. RR ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_3anass | |- ( ( P e. X /\ x e. X /\ ( P D x ) e. RR ) <-> ( P e. X /\ ( x e. X /\ ( P D x ) e. RR ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_baib | |- ( P e. X -> ( ( P e. X /\ x e. X /\ ( P D x ) e. RR ) <-> ( x e. X /\ ( P D x ) e. RR ) ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_sylan9bb | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X ) -> ( P .~ x <-> ( x e. X /\ ( P D x ) e. RR ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> x e. _V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_elecg | |- ( ( x e. _V /\ P e. X ) -> ( x e. [ P ] .~ <-> P .~ x ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X ) -> ( x e. [ P ] .~ <-> P .~ x ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_xblpnf | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X ) -> ( x e. ( P ( ball ` D ) +oo ) <-> ( x e. X /\ ( P D x ) e. RR ) ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 9, 10 | #P_3bitr4d | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X ) -> ( x e. [ P ] .~ <-> x e. ( P ( ball ` D ) +oo ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eqrdv | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X ) -> [ P ] .~ = ( P ( ball ` D ) +oo ) ) |
